# Comparison with analytical solution

In addition to comparing to the legacy results from SLAMMER, it is also worth comparing pySLAMMER's results to analytical solutions to sliding block problems. 
In this section, we compare pySLAMMER's calculated sliding displacements for rigid sliding blocks for single cycle harmonic motions of frequencies ranging from 0.5 to 10 Hz to an analytical solution.
